Title: Requires hospitals to include testing for fentanyl in urine drug screenings
Summary: Requires that if a person is treated at a hospital and such hospital conducts a urine drug screening to assist in diagnosing the person's condition, the hospital shall include testing for fentanyl in such urine drug screening; defines urine drug screening.
LawCode: Add ยง2831, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring hospitals to include testing for fentanyl in urine drug screenings
